description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ikmb","text":"Extraction method to obtain genomic DNA from Cryptococcus neoformans.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: Based on Pitkin et al. (1996) Microbiology 142: 1557-1565. Results in ~0.5-2 mg DNA.

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2k88n","text":"Grow a   YPD culture overnight ( ), shaking at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":32,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4s2br","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"71dlb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4hp41","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","guid":"1863F2B0DEF411E8B60257120B528B5D","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"ED376590DEF311E8B60257120B528B5D","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"FB0F5D80E2E011E8A360B5E5FFF800C6","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"ED376590DEF311E8B60257120B528B5D"}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0BEB5A00DEF411E8B60257120B528B5D","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"ED376590DEF311E8B60257120B528B5D","temperature":"30","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"avg8c","text":"Pellet cells in tabletop centrifuge in a 50 ml disposable tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3jnkt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fhhbu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4catd","text":" Optional: wash pellet with water and repeat spin.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"32g1t","text":"Freeze cells at  to   for \u003c30 min, then dry in a freeze drying machine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7ukst","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6jkbn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"404413F0DEF411E8B60257120B528B5D","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"ED44FA20DEF311E8B60257120B528B5D","temperature":"-20","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"48E98490DEF411E8B60257120B528B5D","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"ED44FA20DEF311E8B60257120B528B5D","temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"73ia4","text":"Add the equivalent of   to  of 2 mm glass beads and vortex/shake until the cell pellet is broken and a fine powder is created.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"d435u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eoqa6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","guid":"66ED89F0DEF411E8B60257120B528B5D","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"ED454840DEF311E8B60257120B528B5D","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"6E552360DEF411E8B60257120B528B5D","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"ED454840DEF311E8B60257120B528B5D","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"edo00","text":"In fume hood, add   CTAB extraction buffer (see Guidelines) and mix.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"5kb9p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","guid":"84AD3350DEF411E8B60257120B528B5D","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"ED454841DEF311E8B60257120B528B5D","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"909vl","text":"In fume hood, add   chloroform and gently mix for approximately  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"a6t5c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9mg1o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","guid":"B5FA8200DEF411E8B60257120B528B5D","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"ED459660DEF311E8B60257120B528B5D","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"E7FDDA40DEF411E8B60257120B528B5D","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"ED459660DEF311E8B60257120B528B5D"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5f487","text":"Spin in a table top centrifuge for   (2,500 – 3,000 rpm).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8pmu2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"F1E5DD00DEF411E8B60257120B528B5D","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"ED459661DEF311E8B60257120B528B5D"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e6b2o","text":"Remove supernatant (c. 7 ml) and add to an equal volume of isopropanol in a 15 ml disposable tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ama7d","text":"Gently rock back and forward to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b1rtf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"jk7u","text":"If the DNA precipitates in strands and clumps, spool out with a glass pipette and transfer to eppendorf containing  70% ethanol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3kjej","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3sp0m","text":"Otherwise, spin in a table top centrifuge for  , pour off supernatant and use   70% ethanol to wash DNA pellet and transfer it to an eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":46,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"q028","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1bugf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"da7dg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ahsbn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","guid":"3A15EF70DEF511E8B60257120B528B5D","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"ED45E480DEF311E8B60257120B528B5D","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"44A46B60DEF511E8B60257120B528B5D","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"ED45E480DEF311E8B60257120B528B5D"}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","guid":"C2B3C380E2E111E8A360B5E5FFF800C6","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"ED45E480DEF311E8B60257120B528B5D","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4inna","text":"Spin sample in microcentrifuge for 5-10 minutes. Remove ethanol and allow to air dry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"399cg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2u2or","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ae01a","text":"Resuspend DNA in either water or TE buffer (c. 500 μl). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"58pc2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d35n3","text":"RNase can be added to final concentration of 20 μg/ml if needed. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bo8n1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7vs11","text":"Run   on an agarose gel to check concentration and quality.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"drrft","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","guid":"755A3500DEF511E8B60257120B528B5D","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"EDDF8C70DEF311E8B60257120B528B5D","unit":1}}}}
